desc: We create a stunning range of candles, wax melts and Reed diffusers and handmade gifts in our eco workshop in Cornwall. We also have a luxury range of bath bombs, eco friendly cosmetics and Cornish bath salts. A great place to find that perfect handmade Cornish gift. Our aim is to bring Cornwall to your home.

layout.text:
Luxury Soy wax Candles, wax melts, Reed diffusers and other luxury home fragrance gifts. Handmade soaps, bath bombs, cornish cosmetics and handmade Cornish gifts carefully crafted in our sustainable workshop by the sea.
All our products are eco friendly, vegan friendly and cruelty free. As a family run Cornish buisness we feel it’s our duty to provide you products crafted from the highest quality ingredients.
